title: Alex Jones Show - 2012 Feb 16 TH [sebaygo1]
description:
.
							
The Alex Jones Show
Thursday, 16 February 2012


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site ::

Alex talks with activist, speaker and blogger Rosa Koire about the United Nations\' Agenda 21. Koire is a forensic real estate appraiser specializing in eminent domain valuation. She is the co-founder of the Santa Rosa Neighborhood Coalition, Democrats Against UN Agenda 21, and the Post Sustainability Institute. She is the author of Behind the Green Mask: U.N. Agenda 21, a book now available at the Infowars Store. 

Alex also confronts the latest news as the globalists continue to ramp up their plan to attack Iran and Syria. He also takes on a dubious report proffered by the establishment newspaper The Telegraph that Iran has teamed up with al-Qaeda.

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
